Vintage Guitars Museum and Bar! Get directions

Welcome to our vintage guitars exhibit in San Francisco, where we celebrate the iconic sounds of the 1950s and 1960s through a stunning collection of vintage guitars.

Explore an impressive selection of rare vintage guitars, from the twang of a Telecaster to the smooth hum of a Les Paul, at our exhibit celebrating the iconic sounds of the 1950s and 1960s.
